page.title: 02LOCAL ISSUES IN SEAFORD
page.content: {SEAFORD}HAS SEVERAL LOCAL NEWSPAPERS. MANY PEOPLE READ{THE EVENING ARGOS,}A BRIGHTON EVENING PAPER.{THE {EASTBOURNE GAZETTE}RUNS A SEAFORD EDITION ON WEDNESDAYS AND{THE SUSSEX {EXPRESS,}WHICH SERVES A WIDE AREA, COMES OUT ON FRIDAYS. IN THE NEWS AT THE MOMENT WE ARE READING ABOUT THE{NEW SUPERMARKET CALLED SAFEWAYS TO BE BUILT IN DANE ROAD.ANOTHER BIG ISSUE IS THAT PEOPLE DON'T WANT ANY MORE {NEW HOUSES}BUILT IN THE{GREEN SPACES.}IT IS HOPED THAT A{LEISURE CENTRE} AND{NEW HEALTH {CENTRE}WILL BE BUILT BEFORE TOO LONG. MANY SEAFORDIANS ARE CONCERNED ABOUT THE RUN DOWN STATE OF THE{SEAFRONT AREA AND ARE CAMPAINING FOR LEWES DISTRICT COUNCIL TO IMPROVE IT. { CAR PARKING}IN THE TOWN HAS CAUSED A LOT OF CONTROVERSY IN RECENT MONTHS.
